metaknowledge

A Python3 Library that simplifies bibliometric research.

Examples

  • Extract Text September 04, 2015 You want to extract textual data to analyze.
  • Contruct a Multi-Mode Network September 04, 2015 You want to construct a Multi-Mode Network.
  • Contruct a Journal Co-Citation Network September 04, 2015 You want to construct a Weighted Co-Citation Network of Journals.
  • Contruct a Document Co-Citation Network September 04, 2015 You want to construct a weighted co-citation network of documents.
  • Contruct a Data Frame September 04, 2015 You want to construct a dataset from a folder of Web of Science files.
  • Contruct a Co-Author Network September 04, 2015 You want to construct a weighted network of co-authors.
  • Contruct a Citation Network September 04, 2015 You want to construct a weighted citation network.
  • Contruct an Author Co-Citation Network September 04, 2015 You want to construct a weighted co-citation network of authors.
